name: AGT

script_phases.name: R.swift
script_phases.script:
[[ $ACTION == "indexbuild" ]] && exit
"$PODS_ROOT/R.swift/rswift" generate "${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/AGT/Sources/R.generated.swift" --hostingBundle 'AGTResources' --target 'AGT-AGTResources'
chmod 0666 "${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/AGT/Sources/R.generated.swift"
sed -i '' -e 's/fileprivate static let hostingBundle /static let hostingBundle /g' "${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/AGT/Sources/R.generated.swift"
chmod 0444 "${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/AGT/Sources/R.generated.swift"
